name: FOUNTAIN.WAD
description: A fast and fun deathmatch WAD for two. A fun chase WAD. Lots of walk-through walls in the main courtyard, a few teleporters for escapes, (check between the left support and wall of the main stairs...) all the weapons are there, a few of my favorite monsters, and the fountain of death. You'll find many dead bodies there! Part of the DEATH for 2!!
